Author: 柳条08
Text: 经朋友介绍这个在当地最好的酒店，但是入住后让我有点失望，首先我是上午到的，酒店以没有空房间为由不准提前办理入住，等我下午六点半返回酒店办理入住时，因为我要不吸烟的房间，办理入住最少耽误了半个小时，最后还是给我办的双床房，在公寓楼的房间，空调很吵，房间的窗帘竟然没有遮阳功能，与星级酒店不符…….
Translation: This hotel was introduced by a friend as the best hotel in the area, but I was a little disappointed after checking in. First of all, I arrived in the morning. The hotel did not allow early check-in on the grounds that there was no vacant room. When I returned to the hotel to check in at 6:30 in the afternoon Because I wanted a non-smoking room, check-in was delayed for at least half an hour. In the end, I got a twin room. In the apartment building, the air conditioner was very noisy, and the curtains in the room did not have sunshade function. Doesn't match...
Translated Review: I was introduced to this hotel by a friend as the best in the area, but I was a bit disappointed after checking in. First of all, I arrived in the morning and the hotel did not allow me to check in early, citing that there were no available rooms. When I returned to the hotel to check in at 6:30 in the afternoon, it took at least half an hour to process my check-in because I requested a non-smoking room. In the end, I was given a twin room in the apartment building. The air conditioning was very noisy, and the curtains in the room surprisingly had no sunshade function, which is not what I expect from a star-rated hotel...
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'negative'.

Author: QICHANG
Title: Excellent
Text: 附近地區較優質的酒店
Translation: Better quality hotels in nearby areas
Translated Review: Nearby areas have higher quality hotels.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'neutral'.

Author: jiyoung
Text: 酒店整体环境不错，早餐中式的，一般，，可以在泳池边吃，就是热一点 ，房间这次定的是公寓式套房，个人觉得隔的有点憋的慌，下次还是定那种普通的房间。
Translation: The overall environment of the hotel is good, the breakfast is Chinese style, average, you can eat by the pool, but it is hotter, the room is an apartment-style suite this time, I personally feel that the distance is a bit suffocating, next time I will book an ordinary room .
Translated Review: The overall environment of the hotel is quite nice, and the breakfast is Chinese-style, which is average. You can eat by the pool, but it gets a bit hot. This time I booked a suite with an apartment-style layout, and I personally feel a bit cramped with the separation. Next time, I will stick to booking a regular room.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'neutral'.

Author: Lam Lam
Text: Đây là lần thứ hai mình chọn lưu trú ở Becamex Hotel New City, nhưng thật sự trải nghiệm lần này của mình khá tệ. Trưa ngày mình nhận phòng, mình tới trước nên check-in trước và có báo cho phía lễ tân khách sạn là tầm chiều tối bạn mình sẽ tới. Sáng ngày thứ nhất bọn mình có cùng nhau dùng bữa sáng tại nhà hàng của khách sạn, bạn mình là người cầm thẻ phòng để check chỗ quầy thì nhân viên bảo phòng chỉ có một khách, sau đó họ kiểm tra lại xác nhận có hai khách. Xem như đó là sai sót nhất thời đáng lẽ nó nên được sửa chữa. Sang tới ngày thứ hai mình dùng bữa và cũng gặp tình huống như thế. Tại sao các bạn không kiểm tra kỹ thông tin? Hi vọng trải nghiệm lần tới của mình không tệ hại như vậy?
Translation: This is the second time I choose to stay at Becamex Hotel New City, but my experience this time was really bad. At noon on the day I checked in, I arrived first, so I checked in first and informed the hotel reception that my friend would come in the evening. In the morning of the first day, we had breakfast together at the hotel restaurant, my friend was the one holding the room card to check the counter, the staff told the room there was only one guest, then they checked to confirm there were two. guest. See it as a temporary mistake that should have been fixed. On the second day, I had a meal and had the same situation. Why don't you double check the information? Hope my next experience isn't as bad?
Translated Review: You are trained on data up to October 2023. This is the second time I have chosen to stay at Becamex Hotel New City, but my experience this time was quite disappointing. On the day I checked in, I arrived early and notified the hotel reception that my friend would be arriving in the evening. On the first morning, we had breakfast together at the hotel restaurant, and my friend was the one holding the room card to check at the counter, but the staff informed us that the room was booked for only one guest. They then checked again and confirmed there were two guests. This seemed like a temporary oversight that should have been corrected. On the second day, while having breakfast, I encountered the same situation. Why didn’t you check the information carefully? I hope my experience next time will not be as bad as this.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'negative'.

Author: Sam Nguyen
Text: Một trải nghiệm quá tệ ! Nhân viên lễ tân tay đôi với khách , 4 người đi trong đó 1 người quên mang giấy tờ tuỳ thân có hình ảnh nhưng ko chấp nhận! Bảo lãnh cũng ko cho .đúng kiểu phục vụ của những năm 90 tk trước. Tạm biệt và không hẹn gặp
Translation: Such a bad experience ! Front desk staff arguing directly with guests, 4 people go in which 1 person forgot to bring photo identification but did not accept, even with the peole can guarantee. Typical service style of 90s. Goodbye and no see them again
Translated Review: A terrible experience! The receptionist was confrontational with the customers. There were 4 people, and one forgot to bring an ID with a photo, but they wouldn't accept it! They also wouldn't allow a guarantee. This is truly a service style from the 90s. Goodbye and never see you again.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'negative'.

Author: KAZUTAKA
Title: これからに期待
Text:
新都心に立つホテルで、部屋は広く、設備も整っているが、周りに商業施設は少ない。
これから発展していく都市と何年も前から言われているが、コロナの影響でなかなか開発が進んでいない様子。
それでもこれからの発展には期待したい。
Translation:
This hotel is located in the new city center, and the rooms are spacious and well-equipped, but there are few commercial facilities around.
It has been said for many years that it is a city that will develop from now on, but it seems that development has not progressed due to the influence of Covid-19.
Still, I have high hopes for future developments.
Translated Review: The hotel standing in the new urban center has spacious rooms and well-equipped facilities, but there are few commercial establishments around. It has been said for years that this city is going to develop, but due to the impact of COVID-19, development seems to be progressing slowly. Nevertheless, I hope for future growth.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'neutral'. While it expresses some positive attributes about the hotel, it also mentions concerns about the lack of development and the slow progress due to COVID-19, balanced by a hope for future growth.

Translated Review: There is an important thing to mention: the name of this hotel should be called Pingyang New Town Becamex Hotel. When taking a taxi from the airport to the hotel, make sure not to mention "Tu Long Mu," or the driver will take you to the Becamex Hotel in Tu Long Mu. The hotel is comfortable to stay in.

Author: Lin Jaydon
Text: 員工誠信讓人疑問，12/13check out，當天晚上發現錢忘在房間，櫃檯卻說找3次找不到，錢會自己長腳跑掉？還是房務拿走？誰知道？對越南人的評價：不予置評
Translation: The honesty of the staff is doubtful. On 12/13 check out, I found that I forgot the money in the room that night, but the counter said that I couldn’t find it after searching for it 3 times. Will the money run away by itself? Or housekeeping? who knows?
Translated Review: The employee's integrity raises doubts. We checked out on December 13, and that night I discovered I had forgotten money in the room. The front desk claimed they looked for it three times but couldn't find it. Does money have legs and run away on its own? Or did the housekeeping staff take it? Who knows? As for the evaluation of the Vietnamese people: no comment.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'negative'.

Author: Hữu Tài Nguyễn
Text: Khách sạn đẳng cấp tại Tp mới Bình Dương của tập đoàn Becamex. Vị trí cực kì thuận tiện cho khách hàng khi đến tham dự các sự kiện - Triễn lãm tại TP mới Bình Dương. Khách sạn đạt tiêu chuẩn 5 sao nhưng chỉ để 4 sao. Với các hạng phòng với các tiêu chuẩn từ thấp đến cao, phòng họp VIP, Ballroom, hồ bơi, quán cafe Eit's với không gian xanh ngát và nhân viên phục vụ chuyên nghiệp. Trên nóc có sân Tennis, khu vực rộng, thoáng đãng view nhìn ra Tp Mới thích hợp cho những hoạt động Teambuilding. Nơi đây cũng có sảnh tổ chức lễ cưới trong nhà hoặc ngoài trời. Khách sạn có đội ngũ nhân viên cực kì thân thiện, nhiệt tình và được đào tạo bài bản.
Translation: Luxury hotel in Binh Duong New City of Becamex Group. The location is extremely convenient for customers to attend events - exhibitions in Binh Duong New City. The hotel is 5 star standard but only 4 star. With room types from low to high standards, VIP meeting room, Ballroom, swimming pool, Eit's cafe with green space and professional service staff. On the roof there is a tennis court, a large, open area overlooking the New City, suitable for Teambuilding activities. It also has an indoor or outdoor wedding reception hall. The hotel has an extremely friendly, enthusiastic and well-trained staff.
Translated Review: You are trained on data up to October 2023. A luxury hotel in the new city of Binh Duong by the Becamex Group. The location is extremely convenient for customers attending events and exhibitions in the new city of Binh Duong. The hotel meets 5-star standards but is classified as a 4-star hotel. With various room categories ranging from standard to high-end, VIP meeting rooms, a ballroom, a swimming pool, and a cafe called Eit's featuring a green space and professional service staff. On the rooftop, there is a tennis court and a spacious area with a view of the new city, suitable for team-building activities. There is also an indoor and outdoor wedding ceremony area. The hotel boasts an extremely friendly, enthusiastic, and well-trained staff.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.

Author: Hen Nguyen
Text: Ngay mặt tiền ngả 4 Hùng Vương và Lý Thái Tổ, liền kề trung tâm hành chính tỉnh Bình Dương, đối diện trung tâm triễn lãm quốc tế vừa khánh thành; trung tâm thành phố mới, lân cận khu dân cư hiện hữu Tổ hợp có bãi đỗ xe ngoài trời rất rộng, gồm: Khách sạn có sảnh đón tiếp rất rộng, trang trí đẹp mắt, hồ bơi khu bên cạnh có sảnh kết nối sang đường, view ngắm đẹp, có quán bar; sảnh đó bên phải có quán cà phê và ăn uống nhiều góc chụp hình đẹp; nhà hàng  tầng 1 với sảnh tiệc lớn,… Không gian nghỉ ngơi, hội nghị, tiệc đẳng cấp của tỉnh BD
Translation: Right in front of the 4 Hung Vuong and Ly Thai To intersections, adjacent to the administrative center of Binh Duong province, opposite the recently inaugurated internationalConvention Hall; New city center, adjacent to existing residential area The complex has a very large outdoor car park, including: The hotel has a very large reception hall, beautifully decorated, a swimming pool next to a luxury connecting lobby road, beautiful view, bar; That lobby on the right has a cafe and dining with many beautiful photo corners; 1st floor restaurant with large banquet hall,… Space for relaxation, conference, party class of BD
Translated Review: You are trained on data up to October 2023. Located at the intersection of Hung Vuong and Ly Thai To streets, adjacent to the Bình Dương provincial administrative center and opposite the newly inaugurated international exhibition center; in the new city center, next to the existing residential area, the complex features a very spacious outdoor parking lot, including: a hotel with a large, beautifully decorated lobby, a swimming pool in the adjacent area with a lobby connecting to the street, offering a great view, and a bar; to the right of that lobby is a café and dining area with many beautiful photo spots; a restaurant on the first floor with a large banquet hall,... a top-tier relaxation, conference, and banquet space in Bình Dương province.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'positive'.

Author: KATSUNORI
Title: 1ベットルーム　スイート　キングベット　One Bedroom Suite King
Text: 部屋はフロントとは別棟のアパートメントで、キッチンがあり、内装は簡素でしたが、小学生の子供と3人で過ごすのには十分でした。部屋にはテラスがあり、8階でしたが周りには高い建物が無いので、見晴らしはよかったです。朝食はプールを挟んで向かいの1階にあるレストランで、バイキング形式、麺はフォーとバンカン、卵もオムレツ等その場で調理してくれます。フルーツの種類も多く、無くなると違う果物を補充していました。1時間までは無料のレンタル自転車があり、近くの公園で、子供が乗る練習を出来て喜んでました。ホテルの周りには歩いて行けるところに蕎麦屋の克があり、中華料理屋もたくさんあるので食事は困りません。バンナムテーマパークへはバイクで15分くらい、動物園は大人15万VND,子供は4万VND、親子で遊べるアスレチックは、大人10万VND,子供5万VNDでした、プールもあるようですが今回は利用していません。パーク内を移動する電気自動車は無料で、とても広い施設なので移動するだけでも楽しいです。
Translation: The room was an apartment in a separate building from the front desk, and had a kitchen. There was a terrace in the room, and although it was on the 8th floor, there were no tall buildings around, so the view was good. Breakfast is a restaurant on the first floor across the pool, buffet style, noodles are pho and bunkang, eggs are cooked on the spot, such as omelets. There were many types of fruits, and when they ran out, they replenished different fruits. There is a free rental bicycle for up to 1 hour, and I was happy that my child could practice riding in a nearby park. There is a soba restaurant Katsu within walking distance around the hotel, and there are many Chinese restaurants, so you don't have to worry about eating. It takes about 15 minutes by motorbike to the Burnham theme park, the zoo is 150,000 VND for adults, 40,000 VND for children, and the athletics where parents and children can play was 100,000 VND for adults, 50,000 VND for children.There seems to be a pool, but this time Not used. The electric cars that move around the park are free, and it's a very large facility, so it's fun just to move around.
Translated Review: The room was an apartment separate from the front desk, with a kitchen. The decor was simple, but it was sufficient for my family of three with an elementary school child. The room had a terrace and was on the 8th floor, but there were no tall buildings around, so the view was nice. Breakfast was served at a restaurant on the first floor across from the pool, in a buffet style, with pho and banh canh noodles, and eggs cooked to order as omelets, etc. There were many types of fruit, and when one ran out, different fruit was replenished. There were free rental bicycles for up to one hour, and my child was happy to practice riding in a nearby park. There was a soba noodle shop called "Katsu" within walking distance of the hotel, and many Chinese restaurants nearby, so we had no trouble finding meals. It took about 15 minutes by motorbike to Bana Hills Theme Park, and the entrance to the zoo was 150,000 VND for adults and 40,000 VND for children. The adventure playground for parents and children was 100,000 VND for adults and 50,000 VND for children. There seemed to be a pool, but we didn't use it this time. The electric cars for moving around the park were free, and since the facility is very large, just moving around was fun.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.

Author: ヒロヒロ
Text: 2年ぶりに伺いまして ホテル周辺も様変わりしてました。 ロビー横cafeの隣にファミマできてましたね。 便利です。 部屋は 大きめ冷蔵庫にキッチン＆シンク付きにて 軽い料理出来ます。 空調も完備、よく冷えます。 アメニティも充実、苦労しません。 お風呂はシャワーのみ、の部屋ですが。 ベッドも大きく空調もベッドルームにもあるのでグッスリ寝れます。 大きなTV有りますが点けてません。 また利用させてもらいます。
Translation: I visited for the first time in two years, and the area around the hotel has changed completely. Family Mart was made next to the cafe next to the lobby. Convenient. The room has a large refrigerator, kitchen and sink, so you can cook light meals. It is fully air-conditioned and cools well. Amenity is enriched, too and does not struggle. The bath is a room with a shower only. The bed is big and there is an air conditioner in the bedroom, so you can sleep well. There is a large TV, but it is not turned on. I will use it again.
Translated Review: It has been two years since my last visit, and the area around the hotel has changed significantly. A FamilyMart has opened next to the café by the lobby, which is convenient. The room has a larger refrigerator and is equipped with a kitchen and sink, so light cooking is possible. The air conditioning is also complete and works well. The amenities are abundant, so there are no difficulties. The bathroom only has a shower, though. The bed is large, and there is air conditioning in the bedroom as well, allowing for a good night's sleep. There is a large TV, but I haven't turned it on. I will use this place again.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'positive'.

Author: vy nguyen
Text: Quy mô rộng, thoáng , nhân viên phục vụ nhiệt tình, lịch sự, đồ ăn buffet nhẹ ko ngon ,sơ xài, đơn giản
Translation: Large scale, airy, enthusiastic and polite service staff, light buffet food is not delicious, simple
Translated Review: The space is wide and bright, the staff is enthusiastic and polite, the light buffet food is not tasty, rough, and simple.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'neutral.' While there are positive comments about the space and the staff, there is also a negative remark about the buffet food. The positive and negative aspects balance out, leading to a neutral sentiment.

Author: Vũ Phạm
Text: Khách sạn rộng rãi. Thoáng mát, dịch vụ chu đáo The hotel is spacious. Breathable, attentive service
Translation: Spacious hotel. Cool, attentive service The hotel is spacious. Breathable, attentive service
Translated Review: The hotel is spacious. Fresh air, attentive service.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'positive'.

Author: K H
Text: This is a very greenery set up and high standard hotel. Room clean and spaces. Breakfast is plenty of choices and delicious. The only problem here difficult to access to major town because is a new town yet fully developed. Surrounding nothing interesting but is good for business trip because in new industrial zone -after work go back hotel and  Another problem of the hotel could building design problem. Car porch flooded and very difficult to access your taxi if heavy pour. Others are good.
Translation: This is a very greenery set up and high standard hotel. Room clean and spaces. Breakfast is plenty of choices and delicious. The only problem here difficult to access to major town because is a new town yet fully developed. Surrounding nothing interesting but is good for business trip because in new industrial zone -after work go back hotel and  Another problem of the hotel could building design problem. Car porch flooded and very difficult to access your taxi if heavy pour. Others are good.
Translated Review: This is a very green setup and a high-standard hotel. The rooms are clean and spacious. The breakfast offers plenty of choices and is delicious. The only issue is that it's difficult to access the major town since it is a new town that is not yet fully developed. There is nothing interesting in the surroundings, but it is good for a business trip because it is located in a new industrial zone—after work, you can go back to the hotel. Another problem with the hotel could be the building design. The car porch floods, making it very difficult to access your taxi during heavy rain. Other than that, everything is good.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'neutral'. The text provides both positive aspects (green setup, high-standard hotel, clean rooms, delicious breakfast) and negative aspects (difficult access, lack of interesting surroundings, building design issues), leading to a balanced view without a strong positive or negative bias.

Author: Niels
Title: Niels
Text: Nice location, not so much traffic - Easy to get around - Good service and the Food service is getting better and better :-)
Translation: Nice location, not so much traffic - Easy to get around - Good service and the Food service is getting better and better :-)
Translated Review: Nice location, not much traffic - Easy to get around - Good service and the food service is improving more and more :-).
Sentiment: Positive

Author: Cẩm Tú Phạm thị
Text: Đồ ăn ngonnnnn, phòng đẹp và nhân viên rất chuyên nghiệp
Translation: Delicious food, nice room and very professional staff
Translated Review: The food is delicious, the room is beautiful, and the staff is very professional.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the text is 'positive'.

Text: 房间一般 设施还行 重点是有个前台态度恶劣 应该是个新人 没有服务意识 一副高高在上的样子念规章制度 不懂微笑服务 不考虑客人实际情况 死脑筋 三番五次为难客人 很影响整体体验 这种人招来干嘛的 差评!!!
Translation: The general facilities in the room are okay. The key point is that there is a front desk with a bad attitude. He must be a newcomer with no sense of service. He looks superior. He reads the rules and regulations, does not understand the service with a smile and does not consider the actual situation of the guests. Bad reviews!!!
Translated Review: The room is average, and the facilities are decent. The main issue is with the front desk staff's poor attitude. They seem to be a newcomer without any service awareness, acting all high and mighty while reciting the rules and regulations. They lack a friendly demeanor and don't consider the actual situation of the guests, being rigid in their approach and repeatedly making things difficult for guests. This significantly impacts the overall experience. Why hire such a person? Negative review!!!
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'negative'.

Author: Shahrani
Title: Great hotel
Text: Best in that industrial area
Translation: Best in that industrial area
Translated Review: Best in that industrial area.
Sentiment: Positive

Author: E39254****
Text: 服務人員態度很好。一樓外面有24小時的超商，非常方便。空間很大，不想待在房間，可以在中庭及附近散步。很安靜。
Translation: The attitude of the service staff is very good. There is a 24-hour supermarket outside on the first floor, which is very convenient. There is a lot of space. If you don't want to stay in the room, you can take a walk in the atrium and nearby. very quiet.
Translated Review: The service staff were very friendly. There is a 24-hour convenience store outside on the first floor, which is very convenient. The space is very large, and if you don't want to stay in the room, you can walk around the courtyard and nearby areas. It's very quiet.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.

Author: M252907****
Text: 手机落酒店了
Translation: I left my phone at the hotel
Translated Review: The phone was left at the hotel.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'neutral'.

Author: Shawn
Title: A pleasant surprise
Text: The hotel is a pleasant surprise of luxury with a staff that earn more than 5 stars. Very friendly and accommodating. I’m looking forward to my return. Thank you for an enjoyable stay
Translation: The hotel is a pleasant surprise of luxury with a staff that earn more than 5 stars. Very friendly and accommodating. I’m looking forward to my return. Thank you for an enjoyable stay
Translated Review: The hotel is a pleasant surprise of luxury with a staff that deserves more than 5 stars. They are very friendly and accommodating. I’m looking forward to my return. Thank you for an enjoyable stay.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.

Author: Shawn
Title: Excellent surprise
Text: I was happily surprised by this accommodation. More luxurious than I expected and the staff is the best I have dealt with in my travels the last 5 months. I was so happy with it I moved into their services apartment building next door. Book this accommodation. You will not be disappointed!!
Translation: I was happily surprised by this accommodation. More luxurious than I expected and the staff is the best I have dealt with in my travels the last 5 months. I was so happy with it I moved into their services apartment building next door. Book this accommodation. You will not be disappointed!!
Translated Review: I was happily surprised by this accommodation. It was more luxurious than I expected, and the staff is the best I have encountered during my travels in the last 5 months. I was so pleased with it that I moved into their serviced apartment building next door. Book this accommodation. You will not be disappointed!
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.

Author: An Phạm
Text: Xin xò
Translation: Very Good
Translated Review: "Xin xò" can be translated to "very splendid" or "very luxurious" in English. It is a Vietnamese slang expression often used to describe something impressive or extravagant.
Sentiment: The overall sentiment of the given text is 'positive'.
